alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 12:28PM EST until February 21 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Chagrin River At Willoughby affecting Lake County. Grand River At Painesville affecting Lake County. Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry affecting Stark County. For the Chagrin River...including Willoughby...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Grand River...including Painesville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maumee River...including Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Nimishillen Creek...including North Industry...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding begins in Side Cut Metropark. The river is out of banks in Waterville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 12.4 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.4 feet on 02/02/1968. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1030 PM EST.
